post.summary: Authenticate user and retrieve access token

get.summary: Check if data source is connected

steps.description: For flow type - array of steps with wait and endpoint types

type.description: Step type - wait for delay or endpoint for notification

timeUnit.description: Time unit for wait type steps (seconds, minutes, hours)

endpointIds.description: Array of endpoint IDs for endpoint type steps

201.description: Endpoint created successfully. Response structure varies based on endpoint type.

get.summary: Get endpoints available for flow creation

200.description: Endpoint details. Response structure varies based on endpoint type (sms, email, telegram, flow, etc.)

steps.description: For flow type - array of steps with wait and endpoint types

type.description: Step type - wait for delay or endpoint for notification

timeUnit.description: Time unit for wait type steps (seconds, minutes, hours)

endpointIds.description: Array of endpoint IDs for endpoint type steps

200.description: Endpoint updated successfully. Response structure varies based on endpoint type.

Endpoint.description: Endpoint model with different structures based on type. The structure varies depending on the endpoint type (sms, email, telegram, flow, etc.)

value.description: Primary value (phone number, email address, etc.) - used for most types except telegram and flow

chatId.description: Chat ID for telegram type endpoints

threadId.description: Thread ID for telegram type endpoints

botToken.description: Bot token for telegram type endpoints

type.description: Step type - wait for delay or endpoint for notification

timeUnit.description: Time unit for wait type steps (seconds, minutes, hours)

endpointIds.description: Array of endpoint IDs for endpoint type steps

userId.description: User ID who owns this endpoint

EndpointInput.description: Input schema for creating/updating endpoints. Structure varies based on type.

value.description: Primary value (phone number, email address, etc.) - required for most types

chatId.description: Chat ID for telegram type endpoints

threadId.description: Thread ID for telegram type endpoints

botToken.description: Bot token for telegram type endpoints

type.description: Step type - wait for delay or endpoint for notification

timeUnit.description: Time unit for wait type steps (seconds, minutes, hours)

endpointIds.description: Array of endpoint IDs for endpoint type steps
